name: Drinking Culture
description: We organize this trip for discovering The Drinking Culture of Vietnamese. From this tour, you will know how The locals make parties,what we drink, how we drink and what foods we eat for parties also. Let's party with us, we are local guys and we love drinking. The content below is just a symbol, so feel free to contact us, it's can be changed which depends on your hobbies and financial conditions.You are going to satisfy with your spends.
